Name: Mines of Volantis
About the game: Volantis, a mineral-rich planet ready to be discovered. After you crash land, you mine deep through the planet. Searching for rare minerals. Your main objective is to find a way home. Are you up for it? Features: Procedural world : The world is uniquely generated each time. You will never know what resources and artifacts you will find next time! Collect : Find valuable resources to sell them and to refuel your harvester. Upgrades : To achieve greater depths, upgrade to a bigger fuel tank, or maybe a bigger cargo bay? The choice is yours. Research : Unlock new technology like advanced thrusters and the personal teleporter! Escape : Construct an emergency communication beacon to send out a call for help.
